comment: TODO-AV: Revise using ` F e. Word dom I ` ? Formerly part of proof of ~ eupth2lem3 : The union of a restriction by an image over an open range of nonnegative integers and a singleton of an ordered pair is a restriction by an image over an interval of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2015.) (Revised by AV, 20-Feb-2021.)
